WRITING.TITLE: Does Pokemon Essentials Come with Original Towns?
WRITING.TEXT:
I'm new to this and I just wanted to know a couple of things: Does essentials comes with the original towns and cities by default?
And is it possible to create tutorial battles with the professor? (like in the original games)
Thank you
Wow my city is on the front page of reddit! Not for the best reason but meh I'll take it.
That poor guy, I was cringing so bad. I'm sure it aint easy but damn it was hard to not notice the stutters.
My god, this is so brilliant.

WRITING.TITLE: Group of teenage boys in tracksuits gave me way so I could cycle past them, I said 'SAFE' instead of thank you and then proceeded to cycle very fast in embarrassment.
WRITING.TEXT: I've never felt so uncool in my life. I'm still cringing, day ruined.
ah okay thanks I'll probably go with the GS route then. Thanks for the help : )

Thank you for this! If it gets to hard to find I suppose Gen II could suffice. Though I did find this video where this spanish guy managed to make a custom Gen I game using 'gamemakerstudio'? it was on this video here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7-dNyogjFqc Though it's pretty hard to follow as it's in spanish after all...
Haha yeah I did mean Gen 1. I completely forgot about the games actually called 'black and white', thanks though
